Im downloading this by season. I think it takes about 1 or 2 days to download one season. It takes quite a while to finish watching one whole season, so while I'm watching one season, I'm downloading the next one. This way I dont have to wait for all the seasons to be downloaded at one time, which can take weeks. It safes me a lot of time (:

The torrent is great btw, so far I have watched 166 episodes and there's only one episode missing subtitles. I can live with that, haha ;)
